snippet: The U.S. House of Representatives on Tuesday overwhelmingly passed a $10.9 billion extension of U.S. transportation funding through May 2015, a measure aimed at averting cutbacks in August in federal money for road, bridge and transit projects....

headline.print_headline: U.S. House Passes $10.9 Billion Transportation Funding Extension
headline.main: U.S. House Passes $10.9 Billion Transportation Funding Extension

lead_paragraph: The U.S. House of Representatives on Tuesday overwhelmingly passed a $10.9 billion extension of U.S. transportation funding through May 2015, a measure aimed at averting cutbacks in August in federal money for road, bridge and transit projects.
